specific_question: What was our employee turnover rate in Q1 2024?
answer: Employee turnover rate was 10% with a 5% increase expected by 2025.
justification: Employee retention metrics do not address the core DR Question focus area on CRM and patient engagement
dr_question: How can MediConn Solutions leverage trendy new CRM solutions to improve patient engagement and retention, and what new CRM solutions are expected in 2025?
